message:
# Task List

1. ⏳ Explore the repository structure
Familiarize with the repository to identify code responsible for E3041 validation
2. ⏳ Create and run a script to reproduce E3041 validation error
Develop a script to replicate the error described in the issue and execute it to confirm the presence of the error
3. ⏳ Modify the source code to resolve E3041 issue
Implement necessary code changes to ensure that setting the DNS root record passes validation
4. ⏳ Rerun the reproduce script to confirm fix of E3041 error
Validate the implemented changes by ensuring the error is resolved when running the reproduction script
5. ⏳ Add comprehensive tests for edge cases
Develop additional tests to ensure comprehensive handling of edge cases regarding DNS root record validation
6. ⏳ Review the problem description and implementation coverage
Compare current code with base commit and issue requirements to ensure full resolution, run all related tests to verify stability

1. ⏳ Explore the repository structure
Familiarize with the repository to identify code responsible for E3041 validation
2. ⏳ Create and run a script to reproduce E3041 validation error
Develop a script to replicate the error described in the issue and execute it to confirm the presence of the error
3. ⏳ Modify the source code to resolve E3041 issue
Implement necessary code changes to ensure that setting the DNS root record passes validation
4. ⏳ Rerun the reproduce script to confirm fix of E3041 error

5. ⏳ Add comprehensive tests for edge cases
